clues.text: A Rocky Mountain state pahks its cah in front of an East Coast state & falls into this long state of unconsciousness

rounds.text: 2 of the 3 countries that share land borders with Russia & China
rounds.response: (2 of) Kazakhstan, Mongolia, or North Korea
